course_description: This course is offered as part of the Singapore-MIT Alliance (SMA), and will be delivered at MIT (by MIT faculty) for MIT students and simultaneously broadcast to the National University of Singapore (NUS) for SMA students. In some cases the roles will reverse: the classes will be delivered at NUS (by NUS SMA faculty) and simultaneously broadcast to MIT.
course_name: Numerical Methods for Partial Differential Equations (SMA 5212)
course_prerequisites: MIT: 18.03 or 18.06 or equivalent; and familiarity with MATLAB®.
